Tutorial courses

Tutorial courses#

This section contains self-contained courses teaching the usage of TOML Fortran. Each tutorial is a full example for a specific application covering several aspects of the library.

Contributions are welcome!

If you have written on TOML Fortran and want to contribute to the documentation, feel free to fork the repository and submit a pull request.

Difficulty: Beginner

  • Getting started
  • Converting from Namelist to TOML
    • Background: Namelists vs TOML
    • Example: Simulation Configuration
      • Namelist Approach
      • TOML Approach
    • Migration Strategy
      • Comparison Programs
    • Advanced Example: Nested Configuration
      • Complex Namelist
      • Complex TOML
    • Building and Running
    • Key Differences Summary
    • Benefits of Migration
    • See Also

    • Configuration of the linter

    • Summary
